title: Level 5: Pattern Prediction
description:
The lab's IoT sensors have been monitoring atmospheric conditions to predict snowflake formation patterns!

Your task: Analyze the sensor data and predict the most likely snowflake arm pattern.

{{input}}

Rules for prediction:
1. If humidity > 85% AND temperature < -18°C → High complexity → pattern: '*+#'
2. If humidity > 75% AND temperature < -12°C → Medium complexity → pattern: '*+*'
3. If wind_speed < 5 m/s AND humidity > 80% → Symmetric → pattern: '***'
4. Otherwise → Low complexity → pattern: '*-*'

Apply rules in order (first match wins). What pattern will form?
hint: Parse the JSON to extract humidity, temperature, and wind_speed. Check each rule in order from 1 to 4. Return the pattern from the first matching rule.
